DataElement.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire Have Tenderness Action Performed Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's description of the action taken for tenderness in their arm, breast, or chest, using a text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire Have Tenderness Action Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer._A question about whether an individual has or had tenderness._A thing done._Executed and carried through to completion.
